results.title: In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: The results of this study suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ is an immune modulatory agent and improves thyroid function in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@.

citations.NLM: Gullu S, Emral R, Bastemir M, Parkes AB, Lazarus JH. In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Eur J Endocrinol. 2005 Jul;153(1):41-8. PMID: 15994744
citations.BibTeX: @article{15994744, title={In vivo and in vitro effects of statins on lymphocytes in patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.}, author={Gullu S and Emral R and Bastemir M and Parkes AB and Lazarus JH}, journal={Eur J Endocrinol}, volume={153}, number={1}, pages={41-8}}

results.title: Statins decrease the aberrant HLA-DR expression on thyrocytes from patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.
results.text_hl: However, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ could significantly inhibit the "aberrant" HLA-DR expression on @<m>DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@ thyrocytes and decrease @GENE_IFNG @GENE_3458 @@@IFN-gamma@@@- induced HLA-DR expression in both @<m>DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@HT@@@ and normal thyroid cells (p<0.01).

citations.NLM: Wu X, Schott M, Liu C, Qian C, Mao X, Xu K, Jiang J, Xu Y, Shen M, Papewalis C, Scherbaum WA, Liu C. Statins decrease the aberrant HLA-DR expression on thyrocytes from patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis. Horm Metab Res. 2008 Dec;40(12):838-41. PMID: 18686224
citations.BibTeX: @article{18686224, title={Statins decrease the aberrant HLA-DR expression on thyrocytes from patients with Hashimoto's thyroiditis.}, author={Wu X and Schott M and Liu C and Qian C and Mao X and Xu K and Jiang J and Xu Y and Shen M and Papewalis C and Scherbaum WA and Liu C}, journal={Horm Metab Res}, volume={40}, number={12}, pages={838-41}}

results.title: Moderate-dose simvastatin therapy potentiates the effect of vitamin D on thyroid autoimmunity in levothyroxine-treated women with Hashimoto's thyroiditis and vitamin D insufficiency.
results.text_hl: Moderate-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy potentiates the effect of @CHEMICAL_Vitamin_D @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014807 @@@vitamin D@@@ on @DISEASE_Thyroiditis_Autoimmune @DISEASE_MESH:D013967 @@@thyroid autoimmunity@@@ in @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Hashimoto_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050031 @@@Hashimoto's thyroiditis@@@ and @DISEASE_Vitamin_D_Deficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D014808 @@@vitamin D@@@ insufficiency.

citations.NLM: Krysiak R, Szkróbka W, Okopień B. Moderate-dose simvastatin therapy potentiates the effect of vitamin D on thyroid autoimmunity in levothyroxine-treated women with Hashimoto's thyroiditis and vitamin D insufficiency. Pharmacol Rep. 2018 Feb;70(1):93-97. PMID: 29331793
citations.BibTeX: @article{29331793, title={Moderate-dose simvastatin therapy potentiates the effect of vitamin D on thyroid autoimmunity in levothyroxine-treated women with Hashimoto's thyroiditis and vitamin D insufficiency.}, author={Krysiak R and Szkróbka W and Okopień B}, journal={Pharmacol Rep}, volume={70}, number={1}, pages={93-97}}
